title: Student trying to keep his browser
selftext:
Hi guys,  
As a student I'm not able to pay the subscription price for Sidekick pro. I used the free version for some time, but out of nowhere, I can't activate all of my sessions (only 2 of them). I really liked this feature, as it allows you to store different tabs together and replace windows/sessions very fast. Are there browsers with exactly the same functionality (so no workspaces that eat up your RAM)?  
Or can you please use my link to download the Sidekick browser (I need 20 people to sign in after downloading to get it free for a lifetime)?  
[https://join.meetsidekick.com/s92dv](https://join.meetsidekick.com/s92dv)

Thanks
comments: Dont be so attached to specific technology. If you like it and see use in it then just buy it. Personally I dont see enough value in it to pay for it.
